body:
Hi Andy,


I was interested in Ladan Ghobad's presentation on the third day of the
Radiance Workshop (Thesis, NC State) but could not attend the session
because of conflicts.  That particular session's slides have not been
uploaded on the radiance site.  Any way to access them?


Regards.
Shamim.
